definition[0]: a serious magazine produced for professional people or those with a particular interest
definition[1]: a written record that you make of the things that happen to you each day
example[1]: He decided to keep a journal.
definition[2]: a serious magazine or newspaper produced for professional people or those with a particular interest
definition[3]: a book containing details of TRANSACTIONs (=acts of buying and selling) of a business in the order that they happen
